challenge.input: Hi, I'm Alex Chen. I'm a data scientist at Google.
I'm 32 years old and I live in San Francisco.
I have a PhD in Machine Learning from Stanford. Graduated in 2018.
I've been programming for 10 years, started with Java.
I'm married to someone named Jordan. We have a dog named Max.
I started at Google 3 years ago, right after my PhD.
